00001 #include <iostream>
00002 #include <fstream>
00003 #include <string>
00004 
00005 #include "global.h"
00006 #include "gppopulation.h"
00007 #include "gpoperators.h"
00008 #include "usefulfunctions.h"
00009 #include "rng.h"
00010 
00011 using namespace std;
00012 
00013 int main( int argc, char* argv[] ) {
00014 
00015         setupGlobals(argc, argv);
00016         loadFiles(training_file, testing_file);
00017         setupNodeLists();
00018 
00019 
00020         if (!seed_specified) {
00021                 seed = time(0) ^ (getpid() << 16);
00022         }
00023         rng.reseed(seed);
00024 
00025         printSettings();
00026 
00027         int best1 = 0;
00028         int best2 = 0;
00029         int worst = 0;
00030         double fit1 = 0.0;
00031         double fit2 = 0.0;
00032 
00033         int trainHits = 0;
00034         int testHits = 0;
00035 
00036         // create population
00037         GPPopulation *pop = new GPPopulation(popsize, genomeSize);
00038         pop->calculatePopulationFitness();
00039 
00040         best1 = pop->getIndexOfBest();
00041 
00042         double trainPerf = pop->getIndividual(best1)->getFitness();
00043         double testPerf = pop->getIndividual(best1)->getTestFitness();
00044 
00045         trainHits = pop->getIndividual(best1)->getNumberOfHits(hitsCriterion, true);
00046         testHits = pop->getIndividual(best1)->getNumberOfHits(hitsCriterion, false);
00047 
00048         std::ofstream logger(logfile.c_str());
00049         logger << "0\t" << 1.0 / (1.0 + trainPerf) << "\t" << 1.0 / (1.0 + testPerf) << "\t" << trainHits << "\t" << testHits << endl;
00050         logger.flush();
00051 
00052         GPProgram* elite;
00053 
00054         for (int i=1; i<=numgens; i++) {
00055                 best1 = pop->getIndexOfBest();
00056                 elite = new GPProgram(*(pop->getIndividual(best1)));
00057                 fit1 = elite->getFitness();
00058 
00059                 // do operators
00060                 tournamentSelection(*pop);
00061                 crossover(*pop);
00062                 mutation(*pop);
00063 
00064                 // calculate fitness
00065                 pop->calculatePopulationFitness();
00066                 best2 = pop->getIndexOfBest();
00067                 fit2 = pop->getIndividualFitness(best2);
00068 
00069                 if (fit1 < fit2) {
00070                         // we've thrown away a better guy, so replace
00071                         // the individual at worst index with the one
00072                         // at best1
00073                         worst = pop->getIndexOfWorst();
00074                         pop->setIndividual(worst, elite);
00075                         trainPerf = fit1;
00076                         testPerf = elite->getTestFitness();
00077                         pop->setIndexOfBest(worst);
00078                         
00079                         // get the hits
00080                         trainHits = pop->getIndividual(best1)->getNumberOfHits(hitsCriterion, true);
00081                         testHits = pop->getIndividual(best1)->getNumberOfHits(hitsCriterion, false);
00082                 }
00083                 else {
00084                         trainPerf = fit2;
00085                         testPerf = pop->getIndividual(best2)->getTestFitness();
00086         
00087                         // get the hits
00088                         trainHits = pop->getIndividual(best2)->getNumberOfHits(hitsCriterion, true);
00089                         testHits = pop->getIndividual(best2)->getNumberOfHits(hitsCriterion, false);
00090 
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 logger << i << "\t" << 1.0 / (1.0 + trainPerf) << "\t" << 1.0 / (1.0 + testPerf) << "\t" << trainHits << "\t" << testHits << endl;
00094         }
00095 
00096         // save best indy
00097         std::ofstream the_best(best_file.c_str());
00098         elite = new GPProgram(*(pop->getBestIndividual()));
00099         the_best << *elite << endl;
00100         the_best.flush();
00101         the_best.close();
00102         logger.flush();
00103         logger.close();
00104 
00105         delete elite;
00106         delete pop;
00107         cleanup();
00108 
00109         return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00110 }
